author: ggovi
body:
The classes EcalPulseCovariance and EcalPulseShape have been added in the dropbox list.
In addition, the tool for validating the conditions migrated from v1 to v2 has been modified to use the existing validation functions.
Automatically ported from CMSSW_7_4_X #7650
title: new ecal classes added for uploading with dropbox
